message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for us to negotiate a mutually beneficial deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand the value this product brings, but $750,000 is significantly below its true worth.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  This offer reflects its significant value and leaves room for a profitable agreement for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $850,000.
